name: Cute Dogs Jigsaw Puzzles for Kids and Toddlers Lite - Preschool Learning by Tiltan Games
name_original: Cute Dogs Jigsaw Puzzles for Kids and Toddlers Lite - Preschool Learning by Tiltan Games
description:
***** A Must have for every kid who loves Dogs! *****
30 Lovely puzzles for kids and toddlers with cute dogs!

Your kids will just love these hand drawn puzzles. With bright, joyful colors each puzzle is vivid and unique.

Positive and pleasant feedback for the kid for each part and when puzzle is complete. Aimed for kids in the ages 1-6

Content:
* 30 Unique Puzzles
* From 2 pieces up to 30 pieces - you choose your difficulty level.
* Select from two puzzle types - jigsaw puzzle and swipe puzzle
* Paint activity - paint over your favorite puzzles.
* Fun mini games at end of each puzzle - pop balloons or bubbles.

This game contains a single, child-safe in-app purchase to unlock the complete game.
